verses.verse: Take heed <WG4337> that you do <WG4160> not your <WG5216> alms <WG1654> before <WG1715> men, <WG444> to be seen <WG2300> of them: otherwise <WG1490> you have <WG2192> no <WG3756> reward <WG3408> of your <WG5216> Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> is in heaven. <WG3772>

Therefore <WG3767> when <WG3752> you do <WG4160> your alms, <WG1654> do not sound <WG4537> a trumpet <WG4537> before <WG1715> you, as the hypocrites <WG5273> do <WG4160> in the synagogues <WG4864> and in the streets, <WG4505> that they may have glory <WG1392> of men. <WG444> Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, They have <WG568> their reward. <WG3408>
But when you do <WG4160> alms, <WG1654> let not your left <WG710> hand know <WG1097> what <WG5101> your right <WG1188> hand does: <WG4160>
That your <WG4675> alms <WG1654> may be in secret: <WG2927> and your Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> sees <WG991> in secret <WG2927> himself <WG846> shall reward <WG591> you openly. <WG1722>

And when <WG3752> you pray, <WG4336> you shall not be as the hypocrites <WG5273> are: for they love <WG5368> to pray <WG4336> standing <WG2476> in the synagogues <WG4864> and in the corners <WG1137> of the streets, <WG4113> that they may be seen <WG5316> of men. <WG444> Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, They have <WG568> their reward. <WG3408>

But you, when <WG3752> you pray, <WG4336> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> your closet, <WG5009> and when you have shut <WG2808> your door, <WG2374> pray <WG4336> to your Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> is in secret; <WG2927> and your Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> sees <WG991> in secret <WG2927> shall reward <WG591> you openly. <WG1722>
But when you pray, <WG4336> use not vain repetitions, <WG945> as the heathen <WG1482> do: for they think <WG1380> that they shall be heard <WG1522> for their much <WG4180> speaking. <WG4180>
Be not you therefore <WG3767> like <WG3666> to them: for your <WG5216> Father <WG3962> knows <WG1492> what <WG3739> things you have <WG2192> need <WG5532> of, before <WG4253> you ask <WG154> him.
After <WG3779> this <WG3779> manner <WG3779> therefore <WG3767> pray <WG4336> you: Our Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> are in heaven, <WG3772> Hallowed <WG37> be your name. <WG3686>
Your kingdom <WG932> come, <WG2064> Your will <WG2307> be done <WG1096> in earth, <WG1093> as it is in heaven. <WG3772>
Give <WG1325> us this <WG4594> day <WG4594> our daily <WG1967> bread. <WG740>
And forgive <WG863> us our debts, <WG3783> as we forgive <WG863> our debtors. <WG3781>

And lead <WG1533> us not into <WG1519> temptation, <WG3986> but deliver <WG4506> us from evil: <WG4190> For your <WG4675> is the kingdom, <WG932> and the power, <WG1411> and the glory, <WG1391> for ever. <WG165> Amen. <WG281>
For if <WG1437> you forgive <WG863> men <WG444> their trespasses, <WG3900> your <WG5216> heavenly <WG3770> Father <WG3962> will also <WG2532> forgive <WG863> you:
But if <WG1437> you forgive <WG863> not men <WG444> their trespasses, <WG3900> neither <WG3761> will your <WG5216> Father <WG3962> forgive <WG863> your <WG5216> trespasses. <WG3900>

Moreover <WG1161> when <WG3752> you fast, <WG3522> be not, as the hypocrites, <WG5273> of a sad <WG4659> countenance: <WG4659> for they disfigure <WG853> their faces, <WG4383> that they may appear <WG5316> to men <WG444> to fast. <WG3522> Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, They have <WG568> their reward. <WG3408>
But you, when you fast, <WG3522> anoint <WG218> your <WG4675> head, <WG2776> and wash <WG3538> your face; <WG4383>

That you appear <WG5316> not to men <WG444> to fast, <WG3522> but to your Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> is in secret: <WG2927> and your Father, <WG3962> which <WG3588> sees <WG991> in secret, <WG2927> shall reward <WG591> you openly. <WG1722>

Lay not up for yourselves <WG5213> treasures <WG2344> on earth, <WG1093> where <WG3699> moth <WG4597> and rust <WG1035> does corrupt, <WG853> and where <WG3699> thieves <WG2812> break <WG1358> through <WG1358> and steal: <WG2813>

But lay up for yourselves <WG5213> treasures <WG2344> in heaven, <WG3772> where <WG3699> neither <WG3777> moth <WG4597> nor <WG3777> rust <WG1035> does corrupt, <WG853> and where <WG3699> thieves <WG2812> do not break <WG1358> through <WG1358> nor <WG3761> steal: <WG2813>
For where <WG3699> your <WG5216> treasure <WG2344> is, there <WG1563> will your <WG5216> heart <WG2588> be also. <WG2532>

The light <WG5460> of the body <WG4983> is the eye: <WG3788> if <WG1437> therefore <WG3767> your <WG4675> eye <WG3788> be single, <WG573> your whole <WG3650> body <WG4983> shall be full <WG5460> of light. <WG3088>

But if <WG1487> your <WG4675> eye <WG3788> be evil, <WG4190> your whole <WG3650> body <WG4983> shall be full <WG5460> of darkness. <WG4652> If <WG1487> therefore <WG3767> the light <WG5457> that is in you be darkness, <WG4655> how <WG4214> great <WG4214> is that darkness! <WG4655>

No <WG3762> man <WG3762> can <WG1410> serve <WG1398> two <WG1417> masters: <WG2962> for either <WG2228> he will hate <WG3404> the one, <WG1520> and love <WG25> the other; <WG2087> or <WG2228> else he will hold <WG472> to the one, <WG1520> and despise <WG2706> the other. <WG2087> You cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> serve <WG1398> God <WG2316> and mammon. <WG3126>

Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> I say <WG3004> to you, Take no <WG3361> thought <WG3309> for your <WG5216> life, <WG5590> what <WG5101> you shall eat, <WG5315> or what <WG5101> you shall drink; <WG4095> nor <WG3366> yet for your <WG5216> body, <WG4983> what <WG5101> you shall put <WG1746> on. <WG1746> Is not the life <WG5590> more <WG4119> than meat, <WG5160> and the body <WG4983> than raiment? <WG1742>

Behold <WG1689> the fowls <WG4071> of the air: <WG3772> for they sow <WG4687> not, neither <WG3761> do they reap, <WG2325> nor <WG3761> gather <WG4863> into <WG1519> barns; <WG596> yet your <WG5216> heavenly <WG3770> Father <WG3962> feeds <WG5142> them. Are you not much <WG3123> better <WG1308> than they?
Which <WG5101> of you by taking thought <WG3309> can <WG1410> add <WG4369> one <WG1520> cubit <WG4083> to his stature? <WG2244>

And why <WG5101> take you thought <WG3309> for raiment? <WG1742> Consider <WG2648> the lilies <WG2918> of the field, <WG68> how <WG4459> they grow; <WG837> they toil <WG2872> not, neither <WG3761> do they spin: <WG3514>
And yet I say <WG3004> to you, That even <WG3761> Solomon <WG4672> in all <WG3956> his glory <WG1391> was not arrayed <WG4016> like <WG5613> one <WG1520> of these. <WG5130>

Why, <WG1161> if <WG1487> God <WG2316> so <WG3779> clothe <WG294> the grass <WG5528> of the field, <WG68> which to day <WG4594> is, and to morrow <WG839> is cast <WG906> into <WG1519> the oven, <WG2823> shall he not much <WG4183> more <WG3123> clothe you, O you of little <WG3640> faith? <WG3640>

Therefore <WG3767> take no <WG3361> thought, <WG3309> saying, <WG3004> What <WG5101> shall we eat? <WG5315> or, <WG2228> What <WG5101> shall we drink? <WG4095> or, <WG2228> Wherewithal <WG5101> shall we be clothed? <WG4016>

(For after <WG1934> all <WG537> these <WG5023> things do the Gentiles <WG1484> seek: <WG1934> ) for your <WG5216> heavenly <WG3770> Father <WG3962> knows <WG1492> that you have need <WG5535> of all <WG3956> these <WG5130> things.
But seek <WG2212> you first <WG4412> the kingdom <WG932> of God, <WG2316> and his righteousness; <WG1343> and all <WG3956> these <WG5023> things shall be added <WG4369> to you.

Take therefore <WG3767> no <WG3361> thought <WG3309> for the morrow: <WG839> for the morrow <WG839> shall take thought <WG3309> for the things of itself. <WG1438> Sufficient <WG713> to the day <WG2250> is the evil <WG2549> thereof. <WG846>
